tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE analytics (
    analytics_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    media_id INT,
    view_count INT,
    like_count INT,
    comment_count INT
);
CREATE TABLE views (id INT PRIMARY KEY, content_id INT, timestamp TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE likes (id INT PRIMARY KEY, content_id INT, user_id INT, timestamp TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE comments (id INT PRIMARY KEY, content_id INT, user_id INT, comment_text TEXT, timestamp TIMESTAMP)
CREATE TABLE media_content (id INT PRIMARY KEY, title TEXT, type TEXT, upload_date DATE)
CREATE TABLE analytics (id INT PRIMARY KEY, content_id INT, views_count INT, likes_count INT, comments_count INT, timestamp TIMESTAMP)
